definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.chinese: 那個收音機能收短波嗎？

sentences.english: It's necessary to use a short-wave radio to pick up the programme.
sentences.chinese: 必須有一臺短波收音機才能聽到這些節目。

sentences.english: The SWR wattmeter application in short-wave communication system is considered.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了駐波功率表在短波通信中的應用。

sentences.english: You can use a short-wave radio to pick up the programmes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用短波收音機來接收這些節目。

sentences.english: Application is ultrashort also have better curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 應用超短波也有較好療效。

sentences.english: Short Wave, Twin Tube Infrared Heaters are comparable in spectrum to, and slightly longer in wavelength than halogen lamps.
sentences.chinese: 短波，雙筒紅外加熱器比鹵素燈的頻譜稍長。

sentences.english: Turn this switch and you'll hear short-wave broadcasts.
sentences.chinese: 轉動這個開關就能收到短波。

sentences.english: Middle wave and short wave transmission station could obtain some knowledge from the article.
sentences.chinese: 對中短波發射臺站的科學化管理具有借鑑作用。

sentences.english: But they do have shortwave receivers.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們有短波接收器。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the shortwave multitone parallel modem.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了短波多音並行調制解調器。

sentences.english: A shortwave radio might seem like ancient technology these days.
sentences.chinese: 短波收音機如今看來可能像是一種很古老的技術。

sentences.english: The shortwave radiocommunication between Antarctica and Beij- ing is the longest link at present time in China.
sentences.chinese: 南極北京是我國目前最長的短波通信線路之一。

sentences.english: Short-wave communication is the main means of the remote communication between ships on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 短波通信是目前海上艦船實施遠程通信的重要手段。

sentences.english: The sky wave is the major transmitting way of short-wave communication.
sentences.chinese: 因此短波通信的主要傳播路徑是天波。

sentences.english: Short-wave transmission technology has been a hot spot in current research.
sentences.chinese: 短波傳輸技術是短波通信的熱點研究課題。

sentences.english: Short-wave transmission technology has been a hot spot in current research.
sentences.chinese: 短波傳輸技術是短波通信的熱點研究課題。
